channel.title: [request]an actual good 317 server!
channel.description:
hello, i don't know if i am aloud to request a server (the rules only say don't request coder ect...) so im just going to say this (please delete if i am breaking rules). I am going to start a new server but... EVERY SERVER I COME ACROSS IS SO SHIT! I have been looking for like 3 days and i find the same shit over and over again and when i do find a good 1 ITS A FUCKING ADVERTISEMENT. what i really need:
1. mainly need a brilliant economy (drop rates fully working) 2. perfect pvp 3. no shitty commands like fuckin ::master or fuckin ::kill n shit thats just the common shit thats here every fucking day! 4. combat 90-100% (melee, range, mage(full auto cast)) 5. no crappy home made places like a custom pvp area (thats sooooo crap) 6. no trade glitches (dupe, logging/ disconnection lose items)
Thats all i ask for... no harm there just cant find one and writing it all would take FOR EVER! Thanks :) please just remove if im breaking rules

this is not what i want to be!

item.title: [request]an actual good 317 server!
item.dc:creator: @darkdemon501 darkdemon501
item.description:
@darkdemon501 wrote:

^ I understand he shouldn’t be dissing if he never coded in his life, but I kinda agree with him, it is annoying as hell to find every 317 with the same problems, same commands, same items/customs/add-ons as every other server out their…

He just wants to run his own decent server without having to code for a fucking year
I’ve been here since 2007 and i see the same servers leeched and re-leeched with a few minor errors fixed here and there. And gotten my hands on some great servers.
But i’ll admit i can’t code all that well. But i CAN EDIT ;D

But even to those leecher/modifiers out their. AS LONG as they are contributing and not loading on fucking VIRUSES. I am happy, they can repost the same damn thing for all i care

Read full topic

@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

Atlest their trying like you, i bet if you made form scartch like the rest, yours would be the “shittest” and anyways. . . all the stuff u just said to have in a server is easy. . . thoese commands just delete your self takes 2 seconds. the home make ur self its simple and fun. and no dupeing, usally works on most servers. . .most ppl just dont say it. And anyways looking up a tut on that for someone as low as you should be easy. Instead of what the other 2people said “leeching” would be easyer. Just download a CLEAN base and have fun. Dont try to get a server and say the rest are SHIT, becuase i bet you couldnt do better. and you sir have just been burnned^-^
